string.text: $clr_2Welcome to the Unified S.T.A.L.K.E.R. Network.\nBased on available data, there are currently $clr_1$number$clr_2 registered individuals in the Zone. New user registration complete. Welcome to the Chernobyl Exclusion Zone, $clr_1$name$clr_2. Good hunting.
Heard $who’s been spotted in the area, could be more of them.
I feel $who’s in the area. Somewhere... around here.
I think $who’s nearby. Something’s not right.
